samples.question: Where do people often meet new friends?
samples.transcript: First of all, I guess this could be anywhere from music venue to a sports club. it is fair to say that there are many more places to meet today than there were in the past. Another point is that you can meet others through mutual friends. So, you get introduced to friends of friends. We have to remember you can meet friends through your families like kids of parents' friends. this happens when you have social events like barbecues or birthdays. A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.
samples.transcript_original: First of all, I guess this could be anywhere from music venue to a sports club. It's fair to say that there are many more places to meet today than there were in the past. Another point is that you can meet others through mutual friends. So, you get introduced to friends of friends. We have to remember you can meet friends through your families like uh kids of parents' friends. Uh this happens when you have social events like barbecues or birthdays. A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.

We have to remember you can meet friends through your families like kids of parents' friends. this happens when you have social events like barbecues or birthdays. A similar way is through sporting teams. So a lot of people who play football together on the same team eventually becomes friends very close friends as they need to work well together to develop good teamwork skills.

samples.question: And do you think that our idea of friendship changes as we get older?
samples.transcript: It is hard to tell as I do not count myself as being old at the moment. So far, my idea of friendship has not changed that much. But when I was a small child, I think I had more friends. As children, we often have friendship with people who we do not have much in common with. that is less important to us. There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you do not see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

But when I was a small child, I think I had more friends. As children, we often have friendship with people who we don't have much in common with. That's less important to us. There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you don't see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

But when I was a small child, I think I had more friends. As children, we often have friendship with people who we do not have much in common with. that is less important to us. There are definitely some friendships that you grow out of as you do not see that much of each other and you move on. I do think the principle of friendship remains the same as you get older though.

samples.question: Is it important for a friend to have the same hobbies and interests as you?
samples.transcript: Of course it does not have to be exactly the same hobbies or shared interest, but it is good to talk about certain things that keeps the conversation flowing and you can bounce the ideas off each other. For example, many people like football and it is kind of universal language. You can easily connect and talk with somebody of a different nationality about this topic.

For example, um, many people like football and it's kind of universal language. You can easily connect and talk with somebody of a different nationality about this topic.

For example, many people like football and it is kind of universal language. You can easily connect and talk with somebody of a different nationality about this topic.

samples.question: Why is friendship so important to human beings?
samples.transcript: Well, it is probably an evolutionary trait. If you have bonds, ties within a group, you are going to be stronger than just one person alone. If you are alone, you cannot share ideas. All these things help you to survive or did help people to survive with many thousands of years ago. In a modern day world, it is important nice to relax from everyday life. Friends are there to support you. We often have stressful lives today working hard and friends can be really helpful in listening to our problems and difficulties at work. We also need entertainment. And if we have a night out with friends, for example, going to cinema, it can be a fantastic way to forget about any problems we may be having.

samples.question: Do you think it is possible to live without friendship?
samples.transcript: It is definitely possible to live without friendship in life. However, in modern day world, while you could survive, I think your life would be a lot less pleasant and everyday things would be a lot harder without friends.
samples.transcript_original: It's definitely possible to live without friendship in life. However, in modern day world, uh while you could survive, I think your life would be a lot less pleasant and everyday things would be a lot harder without friends.

samples.question: What I mean is that nobody else can live my life.
samples.transcript: A person can give me advice, but in the end, I am responsible alone for my thoughts and actions.
samples.transcript_original: A person can give me advice, but in the end, I'm responsible alone for my thoughts and actions.
samples.transcript_cleaned: A person can give me advice, but in the end, I am responsible alone for my thoughts and actions.

samples.question: Do you prefer spending holidays with friends or family?
samples.transcript: >> It actually depends on where we are going. For example, if we are heading to overseas, I would prefer going with my friend because my family members do not know English and I will have to worry about them and do the all the talking stuff. But if I am with my friends who actually know English very well, we can, you know, have a great time together. >> Mhm.

samples.question: >> Is your city or region a good place for other people to have a holiday in?

samples.question: Any other regions or cities you would recommend to have holidays in?
